name: Lizard

Official sites: Lizard has been nominated for Best International Short Film at the London Short Film Festival 2021 - https://www.shortfilms.org.uk/lsff2021competition
Lizard has been nominated for Best International Short Film at the Sundance Film Festival 2021 - https://www.sundance.org/blogs/news/2021-sundance-film-festival--full-program-announced

description: An 8-year-old girl with an ability to sense danger gets ejected from Sunday school service. She unwittingly witnesses the underbelly in and around a Mega Church in Lagos.
